summary.span: 表示可以按名称或索引访问的节点的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of nodes that can be accessed by name or index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlNamedNodeMap` 会返回以下三个属性。`XmlNamedNodeMap` is returned by the following three properties. - -返回，该类继承自的类`XmlNamedNodeMap`。 - Returns , a class which inherits from `XmlNamedNodeMap`. - -返回`XmlNamedNodeMap`包含对象。 - Returns an `XmlNamedNodeMap` containing objects. `XmlNamedNodeMap` 为只读。The `XmlNamedNodeMap` is read-only. - -返回`XmlNamedNodeMap`包含对象。 - Returns an `XmlNamedNodeMap` containing objects. `XmlNamedNodeMap` 为只读。The `XmlNamedNodeMap` is read-only.
